part.title: Cake
part.step: Preheat oven to 160C and grease a ring cake tin and set aside. Mix all ingredients in a medium bowl for a few minutes with an electric mixer. Pour into tin and bake for 45-60 minutes or until skew come out out clean. Remove from oven and prick the top with a skew, all of over the cake.

part.title: Sauce
part.step: Heat all ingredients in a small saucepan until all are melted and combined. Stir a few times while cooking. Pour sauce on cake while still hot. Leave in tin for one hour, then turn out on to a plate. Serve it warm or cold with cream and strawberries. You can sprinkle the top with a little icing sugar if desired.
